老師人很好，課程輕鬆有趣，但過度沉迷於電玩和虛擬實境，甚至用vr方式授課，效果欠佳。
Though I don't like to take videos, I still learn a lot about speech. Also, I'm braver than before, for I remember what teacher said,"Don't apologize for your fluency."
I enjoy teacher 's casual chatting with us. It's always interesting and somehow engaging.
非常滿意教授的授課方式。
